text:
e="preserve">Pankaj Jaiswal (born 15 June 1992) is an Indian film producer, and owner of Next Entertainment. He has produced films including "Ammaa Ki Boli", "Saare Jahan Se Acha" and "Naa Hausla Harenge Hum".
Career.
Jaiswal graduated from Somaiya college. In 2013, he started his career with the television serial "Naa Hausla Harenge Hum" on Doordarshan. He also produced the web series "Saare Jahan Se Acha" with Prakash Jha as a host. In 2019 He made his debut as a film producer with "Ammaa Ki Boli".
